00020 #define TICKS_TO_NS 25
00021

00026   CaliceTriggerProcessor::CaliceTriggerProcessor()
00027     : TriggerProcessorBase("CaliceTriggerProcessor") 
00028 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00029     ,_histGroupKey(type()),
00030       _histTriggerEventKey("TriggerEvent"),
00031       _histTriggerConfKey("TriggerConf"),
00032       _histTriggerPostKey("TriggerPostHistory"),
00033       _histTriggerPreKey("TriggerPreHistory")
00034 #endif
00035   {
00036 
00037     _description = "Processor to add Trigger information on CALICE data to the event";
00038 
00039     registerProcessorParameter( "TriggerMainWordName" , 
00040                                 "Name of the parameter which will be set to the trigger main word."  ,
00041                                 _parNameTriggerMainWord ,
00042                                 std::string(PAR_TRIGGER_MAIN_WORD) ) ;
00043 
00044     registerProcessorParameter( "TriggerPreHistoryName" , 
00045                                 "Name of the parameter which will contain the trigger pre history: will create parameters: [name]Pos, [name]Bits ."  ,
00046                                 _parNameTriggerPreHistory ,
00047                                 std::string(PAR_TRIGGER_PRE_HISTORY) ) ;
00048 
00049     registerProcessorParameter( "TriggerPostHistoryName" , 
00050                                 "Name of the parameter which will contain the trigger psat history: will create parameters: [name]Pos, [name]Bits ."  ,
00051                                 _parNameTriggerPostHistory ,
00052                                 std::string(PAR_TRIGGER_POST_HISTORY) ) ;
00053 
00054 
00055     _noTriggerActivityRange.clear();
00056     _noTriggerActivityRange.push_back(400);
00057     _noTriggerActivityRange.push_back(200);
00058     registerProcessorParameter( "NoTriggerActivityRanges" , 
00059                                 "Two integers which specify the time in ns before and after the main word during which there should not be any trigger activity."  ,
00060                                 _noTriggerActivityRange,
00061                                 _noTriggerActivityRange,
00062                                 _noTriggerActivityRange.size()) ;
00063 
00064     {
00065       _beamTriggerNames.clear();
00066       _beamTriggerNames.push_back(CALICE::TriggerBits::getName(CALICE::TriggerBits::kBeamBit));
00067       _beamTriggerNames.push_back(CALICE::TriggerBits::getName(CALICE::TriggerBits::kCosmicsBit));
00068       _beamTriggerNames.push_back(CALICE::TriggerBits::getName(CALICE::TriggerBits::kVetoBit));
00069       _beamTriggerNames.push_back(CALICE::TriggerBits::getName(CALICE::TriggerBits::kCherenkovBit));
00070       _beamTriggerNames.push_back(CALICE::TriggerBits::getName(CALICE::TriggerBits::kSC1_3x3Bit));
00071       _beamTriggerNames.push_back(CALICE::TriggerBits::getName(CALICE::TriggerBits::kSC2_3x3Bit));
00072       _beamTriggerNames.push_back(CALICE::TriggerBits::getName(CALICE::TriggerBits::kSC1_10x10Bit));
00073       _beamTriggerNames.push_back(CALICE::TriggerBits::getName(CALICE::TriggerBits::kSC2_10x10Bit));
00074       _beamTriggerNames.push_back(CALICE::TriggerBits::getName(CALICE::TriggerBits::kSC1_100x100Bit));
00075       _beamTriggerNames.push_back(CALICE::TriggerBits::getName(CALICE::TriggerBits::kSC2_100x100Bit));
00076     
00077       std::stringstream description;
00078       description << "Names of all triggers which are considered to indicate physics events. Events with these triggers not set will be ignored. Only these bits are used for data consistency checks" << std::ends
00079                   << "Possible names: ";
00080       for (UInt_t i=0; i<32; i++) {
00081         if (i>0) {
00082           description << ", ";
00083         }
00084         description << CALICE::TriggerBits::getName(i);
00085       }
00086       registerProcessorParameter( "BeamTriggerNames" , description.str()  , _beamTriggerNames,_beamTriggerNames);
00087     }
00088 
00089 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS    
00090 
00091     registerProcessorParameter( "HistogramGroupName" , 
00092                                "The name of the histogram group under which the control histograms will be registered."  ,
00093                                _histGroupKey.nameStorage() ,
00094                                _histGroupKey.name() );
00095 #endif
00096 
00097 }

00100   // CaliceTriggerProcessor::~CaliceTriggerProcessor() {}

00102   void CaliceTriggerProcessor::init() {
00103 
00104     //Some initialization
00105     CALICE::TriggerProcessorBase::init();
00106     
00107     _noMainWord=0;
00108     _eventsWithOutOfRangeTriggers=0;
00109     
00110     assert( !_parNameTriggerPostHistory.empty() );
00111     _parNameTriggerPostHistoryPos=_parNameTriggerPostHistory;
00112     _parNameTriggerPostHistoryPos+="Pos";
00113     _parNameTriggerPostHistoryBits=_parNameTriggerPostHistory;
00114     _parNameTriggerPostHistoryBits+="Bits";
00115     
00116     assert( !_parNameTriggerPreHistory.empty() );
00117     _parNameTriggerPreHistoryPos=_parNameTriggerPreHistory;
00118     _parNameTriggerPreHistoryPos+="Pos";
00119     _parNameTriggerPreHistoryBits=_parNameTriggerPreHistory;
00120     _parNameTriggerPreHistoryBits+="Bits";
00121 
00122 
00123     // trigger paramters
00124     assert ( _noTriggerActivityRange.size() == 2 && _noTriggerActivityRange[0]>=0 && _noTriggerActivityRange[1]>=0 );
00125     _beamTriggerBitMask = 0;
00126     for (lcio::StringVec::const_iterator trigger_name_iter=_beamTriggerNames.begin(); trigger_name_iter!=_beamTriggerNames.end(); trigger_name_iter++) {
00127       _beamTriggerBitMask |= (1<<CALICE::TriggerBits::getBit(trigger_name_iter->c_str()));
00128     }
00129     _noTriggerActivityRange[0] /= TICKS_TO_NS;
00130     _noTriggerActivityRange[1] /= TICKS_TO_NS;
00131 
00132     
00133 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00134     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
00135     histogramList->createHistogramGroup(_histGroupKey);
00136     histogramList->lockGroup(_histGroupKey);
00137     std::vector<std::string> conf_names;
00138     conf_names.push_back("TriggerInputEnabledRaw");
00139     conf_names.push_back("TriggerMainWordRaw");
00140     conf_names.push_back("TriggerInputEnabledMapped");
00141     conf_names.push_back("TriggerEventMapped");
00142     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histTriggerConfKey,conf_names, 4,HistPar((UInt_t) 32+1+2,-.5,32+2.5),true);
00143     std::vector<std::string> trigger_names;
00144     for (UInt_t bit_i=0; bit_i<32; bit_i++) {
00145       trigger_names.push_back(CALICE::TriggerBits::getName(bit_i));
00146       if (trigger_names.back().empty()) {
00147         std::stringstream new_name;
00148         new_name << "TriggerBit" << bit_i;
00149         trigger_names.back()=new_name.str();
00150       }
00151     }
00152     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histTriggerPreKey,trigger_names,32,HistPar((UInt_t) 201,-10-.5,190+.5),true);
00153     histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histTriggerPostKey,trigger_names,32,HistPar((UInt_t) 201,-10-.5,190+.5),true);
00154     
00155 #endif
00156 
00157 
00158 }

00163   void CaliceTriggerProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent* evt){
00164     try {
00165       //UInt_t ev_nr=evt->getEventNumber();
00166     // copy fifo from the event to the trigger handler
00167     getTriggerHandler()->setTrigger(evt);
00168     // search around the nominal main word were the enabled trigger fired.
00169     UInt_t main_word=getTriggerHandler()->searchTriggerMainWord();
00170     evt->parameters().setValue(_parNameTriggerMainWord, static_cast<int>(main_word));
00171     
00172     if (main_word >= getTriggerHandler()->getUsedFifoDepth() ) {
00173       _noMainWord++;
00174     }
00175 
00176     // scan the history before and after the main word
00177     getTriggerHandler()->searchTriggerHistory();
00178 
00179     CALICE::TriggerBits out_of_range_triggers=getTriggerHandler()->getOutOfRangeTriggerBits();
00180     if ( out_of_range_triggers.getTriggerBits() & getTriggerHandler()->getPrincipleTriggerMask() ) {
00181       _eventsWithOutOfRangeTriggers++;
00182     }
00183 
00184 
00185     //get the history prior to the main word and copy it to the event header.
00186     //This history takes only bits into account which were not set in
00187     //the the main word or after those bits were at least one time
00188     //off before the main word 
00189     const std::map<unsigned int, unsigned int > &pre_trigger_history = getTriggerHandler()->getPreTriggerHistory();
00190     std::vector<int> temp_pos;
00191     std::vector<int> temp_bits;
00192     bool dirty_event=false;
00193     for (std::map<unsigned int, unsigned int>::const_iterator history_iter = pre_trigger_history.begin();
00194          history_iter != pre_trigger_history.end();
00195          history_iter++ ) {
00196       temp_pos.push_back(history_iter->first);
00197       temp_bits.push_back(history_iter->second);
00198       if (history_iter->first < static_cast<unsigned int>(_noTriggerActivityRange[0]) ) {
00199         if (history_iter->second  & _beamTriggerBitMask) dirty_event=true;
00200       }
00201     }
00202 
00203     //Do not give the vectors to lcio if they are empty
00204     //otherwise the lcio file gets corrupted !!!!???
00205     if(temp_pos.size()>0) evt->parameters().setValues(_parNameTriggerPreHistoryPos , temp_pos);
00206     if(temp_bits.size()>0) evt->parameters().setValues(_parNameTriggerPreHistoryBits , temp_bits);
00207 
00208 
00209     // get the history posterior to the main word and copy it to the event header.
00210     //This history takes only bits into account which were not set in
00211     //the the main word or after those bits were at least one time
00212     //off after the main word 
00213     const std::map<unsigned int, unsigned int > &post_trigger_history = getTriggerHandler()->getPostTriggerHistory();
00214     temp_pos.clear();
00215     temp_bits.clear();
00216     for (std::map<unsigned int, unsigned int>::const_iterator history_iter = post_trigger_history.begin();
00217          history_iter != post_trigger_history.end();
00218          history_iter++ ) {
00219       temp_pos.push_back(history_iter->first);
00220       temp_bits.push_back(history_iter->second);
00221 
00222       if (history_iter->first < static_cast<unsigned int>(_noTriggerActivityRange[1]) ) {
00223         if (history_iter->second  & _beamTriggerBitMask) dirty_event=true;
00224       }
00225     }
00226     if(temp_pos.size()>0) evt->parameters().setValues(_parNameTriggerPostHistoryPos , temp_pos);
00227     if(temp_bits.size()>0) evt->parameters().setValues(_parNameTriggerPostHistoryBits , temp_bits);
00228 
00229 
00230     CALICE::ErrorBits error(evt->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_ERROR_BITS));
00231     if (dirty_event) {
00232       error.setDirtyEvent();
00233       evt->parameters().setValue(PAR_ERROR_BITS,error.getBits());
00234     }
00235     
00236   
00237     /*
00238 #ifdef TRIGGER_HANDLER_IS_SINGLETON
00239     CALICE::TriggerBits trigger_conf(((LCEvent *) evt)->getParameters().getIntVal(_parNameTriggerConf));
00240     CALICE::TriggerBits trigger_event(((LCEvent *) evt)->getParameters().getIntVal(_parNameTriggerEvent));
00241 #else
00242     CALICE::TriggerBits trigger_conf(getTriggerHandler()->getTriggerConfiguration());
00243     CALICE::TriggerBits trigger_event(getTriggerHandler()->getTriggerEvent());
00244 
00245     evt->parameters().setValue(_parNameTriggerConf , trigger_conf.getTriggerBits());
00246     evt->parameters().setValue(_parNameTriggerEvent, trigger_event.getTriggerBits());
00247 #endif
00248     */
00249 
00250     CALICE::TriggerBits trigger_conf(getTriggerHandler()->getTriggerConfiguration());
00251     CALICE::TriggerBits trigger_andenable(getTriggerHandler()->getAndEnableBits());
00252     CALICE::TriggerBits trigger_event(getTriggerHandler()->getTriggerEvent());
00253     
00254     
00255     evt->parameters().setValue(_parNameTriggerConf , trigger_conf.getTriggerBits());
00256     evt->parameters().setValue(_parNameTriggerAndEnable , trigger_andenable.getTriggerBits());
00257     evt->parameters().setValue(_parNameTriggerEvent, trigger_event.getTriggerBits());
00258 
00259 
00260 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00261     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
00262     histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & trigger_bits_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histTriggerConfKey);
00263     histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & trigger_post_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histTriggerPostKey);
00264     histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & trigger_pre_hist_arr=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histTriggerPreKey);
00265 
00266     unsigned int input_enable=getTriggerHandler()->getTrgConfigurationMask();
00267 
00268     UInt_t main_word_content=0;
00269     if (getTriggerHandler()->isTriggerFifoDepthGood()) {
00270       main_word_content=getTriggerHandler()->getSmearedTriggerMainWord();
00271     }
00272     else {
00273       // trigger fifo error
00274     }
00275     
00276     unsigned int mask=1;
00277     for (unsigned int bit_i=0; bit_i<32; bit_i++, mask<<=1)  {
00278       if (input_enable & mask ) trigger_bits_hist_arr.histogram(0)->fill(bit_i);
00279       if (trigger_conf.getTriggerBits() & mask ) trigger_bits_hist_arr.histogram(2)->fill(bit_i);
00280       if (main_word_content & mask ) trigger_bits_hist_arr.histogram(1)->fill(bit_i);
00281       if (trigger_event.getTriggerBits() & mask ) trigger_bits_hist_arr.histogram(3)->fill(bit_i);
00282 
00283       for (std::map<unsigned int, unsigned int>::const_iterator history_iter = pre_trigger_history.begin();
00284            history_iter != pre_trigger_history.end();
00285            history_iter++ ) {
00286         if (history_iter->second & mask ) {
00287           trigger_pre_hist_arr.histogram(bit_i)->fill(history_iter->first);
00288         }
00289       }
00290 
00291       for (std::map<unsigned int, unsigned int>::const_iterator history_iter = post_trigger_history.begin();
00292            history_iter != post_trigger_history.end();
00293            history_iter++ ) {
00294         if (history_iter->second & mask ) {
00295           trigger_post_hist_arr.histogram(bit_i)->fill(history_iter->first);
00296         }
00297       }
00298 
00299 
00300     }
00301     if (getTriggerHandler()->isSWTriggerOn() ) {
00302       trigger_bits_hist_arr.histogram(0)->fill(33);
00303       trigger_bits_hist_arr.histogram(1)->fill(33);
00304     }
00305     if (getTriggerHandler()->isCalibrationOn() ) {
00306       trigger_bits_hist_arr.histogram(0)->fill(34);
00307       trigger_bits_hist_arr.histogram(1)->fill(34);
00308     }
00309 #endif
00310     }
00311     catch (std::exception &err) {
00312       std::cerr << err.what()  << std::endl;
00313       throw err;
00314     }
00315     
00316   }
00317   
00318   void CaliceTriggerProcessor::end()
00319   {
00320     std::cout << "--- " << name() << " Report :" << std::endl;
00321     std::cout << std::setw(8) << _noMainWord                    << " events for which no main word was found." << std::endl
00322               << std::setw(8) << _eventsWithOutOfRangeTriggers  << " events for which principle trigger inputs could have fired outside the fifo range." << std::endl;
00323   }
00324
